description: Grafana Dashboards for Elasticsearch using Prometheus Datasource

On all nodes

panels.description: % Memory used by selected nodes, both heap and non-heap

panels.description: Number of indices not starting with a dot (.)
panels.title: App Indices

panels.description:
On primary shards

*A segment is a file, aka a lucene index*
panels.title: Primary Segments

panels.description: All shards, both primary and replica shards
panels.title: Total Shards

panels.description: Number of shards which are relocating to another node
panels.title: Relocating Shards

panels.description: Number of shards which are delayed relocating to another node
panels.title: Delayed Shards

panels.description: Number of shards that exist in the cluster state, but cannot be found in the cluster itself
panels.title: Unassigned Shards

panels.description:
Current status of all nodes in cluster

###### Notes

+ `Blue`: constant value
+ `Fds`: File Descriptors
+ `Throttle`: flag `is_throttled`

Indexing rate on cluster

`ProcRate`: processing ability, which is the number of requests that Elasticsearch can handle. Estimation is based on the processed requests and processed time for these requests.
panels.title: Cluster Indexing

panels.description:
Searching rate on cluster

`ProcRate`: processing ability, which is the number of requests that Elasticsearch can handle. Estimation is based on the processed requests and processed time for those requests.
panels.title: Cluster Search

panels.description: Search query rate on data nodes
panels.title: Search Query ReqRate (req/s)
